creator: Shortform Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Join thousands of curious Shortform readers to get smarter, faster.

Get the most detailed, comprehensive book summaries available in the world. Shortform summaries are chapter-by-chapter summaries containing ALL the key points of the book.

Remember the key lessons from books you’ve read, and discover new books you need to read.

Reinforce the key lessons with interactive exercises that challenge you to reflect on your past and improve your life.

Trust in writer quality. Shortform summaries are written by professional authors, PhD’s, and Ivy League graduates.

Check out Shortform summaries of this week’s NY Times bestsellers:
- Sapiens, by Yuval Harari
- Educated, by Tara Westover
- Born a Crime, by Trevor Noah
- Why We Sleep, by Matthew Walker
- 12 Rules for Life, by Jordan Peterson

Check out Shortform summaries of these all-time classics:
- How to Win Friends and Influence People, by Dale Carnegie
- Thinking, Fast and Slow, by Daniel Kahneman
- The 48 Laws of Power, by Robert Greene
- The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, by Stephen Covey

=====================================
KEY FEATURES

✔ Quick 1-page summaries to understand the book at a glance

✔ Chapter-by-chapter comprehensive summaries

✔ 550% more ideas covered than other summaries

✔ Audio narrations to learn on the go

✔ #1 Bestsellers and all-time classic books

✔ Interactive exercises to apply the key lessons to your life

✔ Highlight your favorite passages and take notes

✔ Share key points with friends and co-workers

✔ 18 book categories, including Business, Health, Self-Improvement, History, and more.

✔ Printable PDF downloads for your convenience

✔ Offline mode to read without Internet

✔ Features coming soon: article summaries, publishing feed, and more...


=====================================
WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY

"Shortform has by far the best book summaries available anywhere. They cover all the key points and are far more detailed than other summaries.” -- Andy T.

"You guys really hit it out of the park with this summary! I’ve never seen such a complete yet concise summary of this book. The exercises are perfect – not overwhelming or meager, but just right. Thanks for making me smarter every day." -- Stacey M.

“If real books are like fine wine, and other book summaries are box wine, Shortform is 100-proof vodka.” -- Gregg P.

=====================================
TRY SHORTFORM FOR FREE

Sign up for a 5-DAY FREE TRIAL. Read summaries of books you’ve always wanted to read and spend time with our exercises.

You can cancel your subscription at any time with one click by going to the Billing tab.

=====================================
CONTACT US

Have questions or feedback? Email us at help@shortform.com any time.

Terms of Service: https://www.shortform.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.shortform.com/privacy

descriptionHtml:
Join thousands of curious Shortform readers to get smarter, faster.

Get the most detailed, smartest book summaries available in the world. Shortform summaries are chapter-by-chapter summaries covering the key points of the book, with smart analysis of the book's ideas.

Remember the key lessons from books you’ve read, and discover new books you need to read.

Reinforce the key lessons with interactive exercises that challenge you to reflect on your past and improve your life.

Trust in writer quality. Shortform summaries are written by professional authors, PhD’s, and Ivy League graduates.

Check out Shortform summaries of this week’s NY Times bestsellers:
- Sapiens, by Yuval Harari
- Educated, by Tara Westover
- Born a Crime, by Trevor Noah
- Why We Sleep, by Matthew Walker
- 12 Rules for Life, by Jordan Peterson

Check out Shortform summaries of these all-time classics:
- How to Win Friends and Influence People, by Dale Carnegie
- Thinking, Fast and Slow, by Daniel Kahneman
- The 48 Laws of Power, by Robert Greene
- The 7 Habits of Highly Effective People, by Stephen Covey

=====================================

✔ Quick 1-page summaries to understand the book at a glance

✔ Chapter-by-chapter comprehensive summaries

✔ 550% more ideas covered than other summaries

✔ Audio narrations to learn on the go

✔ #1 Bestsellers and all-time classic books

✔ Interactive exercises to apply the key lessons to your life

✔ Share key points with friends and co-workers

✔ 18 book categories, including Business, Health, Self-Improvement, History, and more.

✔ Printable PDF downloads for your convenience

✔ Offline mode to read without Internet

✔ Features coming soon: article summaries, publishing feed, and more...

title:
Shortform: Read Book Summary
7.2.0

creator: Shortform Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Enjoy audio narrations to absorb key lessons while you’re on the move. Our growing audiobook and podcast library lets you experience bestselling and classic books from anywhere.

ENGAGE AND APPLY
Unlock interactive exercises to apply the key lessons to your life. Highlight passages, take notes, and share insights with friends and co-workers to boost your learning experience.

EXPLORE A DIVERSE LIBRARY

Choose from 18 book categories, including Business, Health, Self-Improvement, History, and more. Enjoy printable PDF downloads and use our offline mode to keep reading without an internet connection. Your learning doesn’t have to stop when you switch devices. Our app integrates with Kindle, Kobo, and supports PDFs so you can enjoy seamless access to your book summaries whether you’re on your phone, e-book reader, or desktop. Read, highlight, and take notes—anytime, anywhere.

WHAT OUR CUSTOMERS SAY

"If I compare Blinkist and Shortform for the book "Deep work" only, I would say that I learned so much more using Shortform. I would say, I learned 1000% more. – Samstremblay.

"You guys really hit it out of the park with this summary! I’ve never seen such a complete yet concise summary of this book. The exercises are perfect – not overwhelming or meager, but just right. Thanks for making me smarter every day." -- Stacey M.

“If real books are like fine wine, and other book summaries are box wine, Shortform is 100-proof vodka.” -- Gregg P.

TRY SHORTFORM FOR FREE

Sign up for a 5-DAY FREE TRIAL. Read summaries of books you’ve always wanted to read and spend time with our exercises.

You can cancel your subscription at any time with one click by going to the Billing tab.

Whether it's a 12 min read or a longer analysis, our summaries cater to all your needs. Our book summaries app includes an extensive audiobook list for those who prefer listening Try the better alternative to Blinkist that offers detailed and engaging chapter-by-chapter summaries than just book summaries. Our free book summaries and interactive exercises help reinforce key lessons from every book.

CONTACT US

Have questions or feedback? Email us at help@shortform.com any time.

Privacy Policy: https://www.shortform.com/privacy
